title: Lynda - SQLite 3 with PHP Essential Training with Bill Weinman

In SQLite 3 with PHP Essential Training, Bill Weinman addresses all of SQLiteÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s major features in the context of the PHP environment. This course covers the fundamentals of SQLite, including a thorough overview of its unique data type system, expressions, functions, transactions, views, and event triggers. A functional CRUD application and web site testimonial engine are demonstrated, and a quick-start guide is included to get experienced developers up and running fast. Exercise files are included in the course.
